alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crawfordville to 6 miles northeast of Carrabelle. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Hyde Park and Panacea-Wakulla Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla
